page.title: 07WELL GREEN FARM AND MR MEES.
page.content: {WELL GREEN FARM }is owned by {MR MEES} He has been farming in Bulkington for 38 years.He grows potatoes,wheat and he keeps beef cattle.He buys his stock from other farms so that he doesn't risk diseases from markets.He owns about 204 acres of land.He owns another farm in Wolvey.The machinery he owns are as follows{1 COMBINE {HARVESTER,2 FORK LIFT TRUCKS,7 {TRACTORS,1 SEED DRILL,2 PLOUGHS.}A normal winter day would be like this.The day starts at 7:30am.Then he feeds the cattle,then he would mix up the animals food,then he will check his machinery to make sure that it does not need repairing.He ends his day at 5:00pm or 6:00pm then he retires for the day. At Harvest time he sometimes works through until 1:00am.
